node.excerpt: Like almost everybody else, we _need to_ test our app in Microsoft Edge, and since we are using Angular.js it seems that Karma + karma-edge-launcher are the best tools to do that. The problem is, karma-edge-launcher's latest version, 0.8.2 at the time of writing, doesn't _gracefully_ shuts down Edge which makes it restore all tabs upon next launch. That's why consecutive CI builds floods Edge with tabs until it stops launching and the only way to fix it is to restart the build server.

frontmatter.title: reset_edge.ps1 — Prevent Karma tests from breaking Microsoft Edge
